OOC: Adults of the time? Transformers came out in 1984, and the movie came =
out I believe in 1986, so you have to expect it to be a "kid's movie." Howe=
ver, the original theatrical presentation of the movie featured the words "=
damn" and "shit," and thus would qualify it as having adult language, yes?.=
..

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: EmprzAnastazia@... 
  To: n=
bwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, January 04, 2003 12:57 AM

t: Re: assorted thoughts


  In a message dated 1/3/03 2:12:45 PM Central S=
tandard Time, lordofdarkness11001@... writes:



    i was surprised =
that nimoy played a bad gud. he is best known for playing spock on star tre=
k. if  they are all big names then why does the  movie get bad ratings 



=

  If anyone who is film academicly inclined, it's a horrible movie... plus=
, it's a specific children's movie, it's not really focused upon the adults=
 of that time, but the kids of the 80's who loved the series. The movie, le=
t alone the Transformers in general is a huge hit to kids. But as a film cr=
itic, it's lousy. 
  But... who cares about the critics, we love Transforme=
rs nonetheless! ;)
